name: Phoenix Fly
description:
Phoenix Fly

Created for UDC Jam Week #12

Embark on an epic adventure in a race across time and space to stop the... Just kidding. Fly through some rings, collect some gems, call it a day.

Note: Web performance is much worse than windows, so if you have a low framerate I highly suggest the downloadable version.

Instructions
  • Fly through rings in order to race against time through ring courses. The faster you complete the course, the better the medal you'll receive. Go for all 7 golds!
  • Collect 50 gems hidden around the map by flying through them.
  • Try not to crash!
Controls
  • Quality
    • 1 - Low Quality
    • 2 - Medium Quality (Web Version Default)
    • 3 - High Quality (Windows Version Default)
  • Gameplay
    • Mouse - Control Ship Direction
    • W - Fly Faster
    • Q/E - Barrel Roll
    • R - Abort The Current Ring Course
    • F - Flappy Bird Mode! Click To Hop.
  • Options
    • M - Mute Music
    • N - Mute Sound
